details.comments: My 8 yr old son actually brushes his teeth now instead of just playing in the bathroom for a hour. He can't wait to unlock more rewards and filters. Good job making this I love it
details.headline: Great idea

properties.label: I received this product for free as part of a sampling program

details.comments: My son is autistic and brushing is tough, he never wants to brush long enough or get the back teeth.... This has been a game changer!!! I don't have to stand there and give him prompts or encouragement...or beg.... He's all about it!!! Thank you so much!!!!!
details.headline: Absolutely love it!!! Game changer!

properties.label: I received this product for free as part of a sampling program

media.caption: Check out these clean teeth ðŸ’ž

details.comments: I had to beg and plead and bargain and negotiate to get my daughter to brush her teeth. Saw this product on an Instragram ad and decided to give it a go. From the moment we opened it and started playing with the ap it was love at first sight. Highly recommended.
details.headline: She begs to brush her teeth now!

details.comments: Just came in the mail today!!! My daughter who has recently began to hate brushing... lived this product. It is super fun! She has begged to brush her teeth and has been so excited for bedtime for one last brush!
details.headline: Life changing!

details.comments: I'm all about making learning fun and this is fun. So this is my plug for Colgate!
details.headline: So fun!

details.comments: the app is simple and really fun, my 5 yo is now REALLY motivated to brush twice a day ; the parents screens are also very useful to track progress
details.headline: I strongly recommend

details.comments: My grandson likes it so much he is asking to brush his teeth. The monsters make it easy to see where to brush. The reward system is motivating.  It helps for parents as it shows where they may be missing.
details.headline: Really works

details.comments: Got this for my 7 year old with autism, and he loves it. However, his 10 year old brother wanted one, too, so I went and got him a toothbrush for younger children so he could also use it. They take turns putting the base on their brushes and love taking pictures with the different virtual prizes they win.
details.headline: Need a preteen version!

details.comments: I can't say enough about this product. My 6-year-old asks to brush his teeth regularly now, and actually enjoys it! His brushing technique and attention improved after only a few uses. The app is simple and straightforward and the rewards make it even more fun! I'm jealous of it and want a similar app of my own!
details.headline: My son now LOVES to brush his teeth!

details.comments: My 7 year old son was so excited for his new Magik toothbrush to get here! He now loves brushing his teeth every morning and night! He has not complained once about brushing his teeth since getting this brush and app! I just hope that they expand the availability of the app to be able to use his Kindle instead of our phones. Also will be needing replacement brushes as my son is hard on them!
details.headline: No more complaints about brushing!
